description:
Christmas comes early..............all you need to do is unpack, sit back and relax!

Immaculately presented and enjoying tropical birdsong from its captivating tree lined boundaries and surrounds, this character-filled family home on an 883m2 block offers an incredible spacious floor plan, inviting pool, flat lawn for the kids and pets, dual living/home based office or income-generating Airbnb facility AND space for the caravan, boat or camper trailer........all within a six minute drive of the charming Buderim Village with its cafes, restaurants and boutiques, only a ten minute drive from both Alexandra Headland and Mooloolaba Beaches and located in the sought after Buderim Mountain State School and Chancellor State College catchment area.

Situated at the end of a quiet residential cul-de-sac with glimpses of the coastline beyond the Gum Tree Drive Bushland Reserve, the home is set back from the road on an elevated block with wrap-around verandah on the upper level overlooking established tropical gardens and in-ground pool below. Featuring cathedral ceilings and seamless transitioning onto the expansive deck, the upper level comprises a large chefs' kitchen with plenty of storage, open-plan kitchen, dining and living area, master suite with fitted wardrobe and ensuite bathroom, two generous sized bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and family bathroom. On the lower level you will find a gem of a dual living facility/man cave/teenagers retreat or home based office featuring an enormous bedroom with fitted wardrobes that could easily be made into two separate bedrooms, an open-plan living and dining room with kitchenette, family bathroom, fitted laundry and two separate integral car garages, one with a tiled floor.

Located within a seven minute drive of Chancellor State College and the University of the Sunshine Coast, an eighteen minute drive of the Sunshine Coast University Hospital and an eight minute drive of Matthew Flinders Anglican College, this stylish family home is guaranteed to become the envy of all your friends and family......so don't delay and book your inspection today.

Information contained on any marketing material, website or other portal should not be relied upon and you should make your own enquiries and seek your own independent advice with respect to any property advertised or the information about the property.


Dual living family home on 883m2
Multiple indoor and outdoor entertaining areas
Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom
In-ground concrete pool and flat lawn
6.5KW solar electricity and town water
Air-conditioned for year round comfort
Two separate integral car garages
Space for caravan, boat or trailers
Estimated: $550-$600 per week for house
Estimated: $380-$420 per week for 'granny flatâ€™
Chancellor State College catchment area
Ten minutes to Alexandra Headland Beach
Sixty minutes to Brisbane Airport
